item.title: Roblox Music Codes And Song IDs
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Roblox has an almost endless amount of content ready for players to discover, but one element you may find to be missing is a little dash of that party atmosphere. But thankfully, you can bring some groove to the game with a wide selection of Roblox music codes.

Popping these codes into the game is easy and allows you to play some of the biggest songs in the world while you explore your preferred Roblox titles. So, we’re going over some of the biggest and best Roblox music codes you can find and explaining how to use them with this guide.

Roblox music codes

Below is a selection of the biggest and most popular Roblox music codes from across the internet:

ArtistSongCode
DrakeGod's Plan1665926924
Charli XCXBoom Clap189739789
Wiz KhalifaBlack And Yellow139235100
Beastie BoysIntergalactic131603357
KelisMilkshake321199908
Boney MRasputin5512350519
System Of A DownChop Suey4556134799
Otto SiebenWe Wish You A Merry Christmas1846820957
A-HaTake On Me4606705490
GorillazClint Eastwood497213766
Super Smash Bros MeleeFinal Destination2801308469
Foster The PeoplePumped Up Kicks2694148776
Black Eyed PeasLet’s Get It Started138134680
Ariana GrandeGod Is A Woman2071829884
Green DayBasket Case3449839683
Lil Nas XPanini3345557951
Squid GameTheme7535587224
PokémonWho’s That Pokémon?130767090
Jason DeruloTrumpets146237847
DisneyThis Is Halloween349626331

How to use Roblox music codes

For Roblox players who want to make the most of Roblox music codes, here is how you use those party-popping codes in Roblox:

  • Purchase the cosmetic item, the Boombox
  • Make sure you are in an experience that supports the Boombox
  • Equip the Boombox and then click on it
  • Once the text box pops up, enter your preferred Roblox music code
  • Enjoy some fun music!

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
